title: Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the db field correctly for certain content types.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
- Create a db field with three types of content: 
  1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag. 
  2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag. 
  3) Text with RTF tags. 
- Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
